text.text: Québec has established a plan to develop critical and strategic minerals (CSMs) from 2020-2025 to meet growing demand for minerals needed for green technologies and the energy transition. The plan aims to develop CSMs ethically and sustainably while respecting the environment and communities with high social and environmental standards.

The plan's vision is for Québec to become a global leader in ethical and sustainable CSM production, transformation, and recycling. If successful, the plan could position Québec strongly in green technologies and renewable energy industries.
